section.h1: Affirmations and Negations – 肯定与否定 (kěndìng yǔ fǒudìng)

items.title: Yes
items.comment: A direct way to say 'yes' in response to statements.

items.title: No (not now)
items.comment: A general negation; can mean 'no' or 'not'.

items.title: No (never)
items.comment: Used for absolute refusal or strong negation.

items.title: Yes, please
items.comment: A polite way to affirm and request something.

items.title: No, thank you
items.comment: A polite way to refuse something.
